channel.title: Family Phone Sites Action Websites Mom Dad Experiment Cars Hiromi on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Family Phone Sites Action Websites Mom Dad Experiment Cars Hiromi on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: ice skating and such
item.description: On saturday - my mom, dad and hiromi all went to the hobby shop to look for hobbies for my father. he didn’t find anything so I later went back and got him a 130 in 1 electronic experimentation kit and a fancy radio control car kit. Hopefully he won’t be bored. Then we all went ice skating.. well we didn’t actually go ice skating - we went to an figure skating show.
